合肥到成都机票查询与预订单程往返出发城市合肥到达城市成都出发日期星期二2016-09-20返回日期星期一2016-09-26查询请输入到达城市携程订票专线400-651-7526国内城市国际城市未找到此城市/车站选择日期到达日期_loader.add('novaPagePanel','http://s4.qhimg.com/static/9b6085afc021e62b/pagePanel.1.0.0.js');/*全屏弹出层*/_loader.add('calendar','http://s0.qhimg.com/static/690aa9b658582f0a/calendar.js');/*日历*/_loader.add('moheCityPickerCss','http://s0.qhimg.com/static/976122869bad5bfe.css');/*citypickercss*/_loader.add('moheCityPicker','http://s1.qhimg.com/static/df87337627108195.js');/*citypicker*/_loader.use("zepto,novaWidget,novaPagePanel,calendar,moheCityPickerCss,moheCityPicker",function(){/*说明usetouch模块的时候iscroll5里不要设置参数tap:true，否则使用tap事件会触发两次*//**1.全屏弹出层novaPagePanel依赖于nova，需要引入touch和novaWidget*2.日历控件使用calendar*3.城市选择需要使用cityPickerCssmoheCityPicker分别为css和城市选择的js*4.日历控件选择日期后回填日期到页面，在calendar.on('select',function(){})回调中操作*/varroot=$('#mohe-m-mb_airticket'),panelEl=$('.js-city-panel'),$cancelPanelBtn=$('.panel-back',panelEl),$input=$('.js-mh-input',root);vartabsTitle=$('.js-ticket-tabsli',root),retDateWrap=$('.js-roundTrip',root),isRoundTrip=false;/*是否往返*//*tab切换*/tabsTitle.on("click",function(){varme=$(this);tabsTitle.removeClass('active');me.addClass('active');if(me.index()==0){isRoundTrip=false;retDateWrap.hide();}else{isRoundTrip=true;retDateWrap.show();}});/*全屏弹出层*/(functioninitPanel(){varpagePanel=newPagePanel({element:panelEl,hash:'m-mb_airticket'});window.panelCity=pagePanel;panelCity.hide();panelEl.on('click','.panel-back',function(e){e.preventDefault();panelCity.hide();});$input.on('click',function(){panelEl.data('target',$(this).data('type'));panelCity.show();});})();/*city弹框操作*/varcityConfig={isPanel:true,/*是否是弹框,如果是弹框则点击选项关闭弹框，不是弹框则保持当前页面*/needSuggest:true,/*是否需要下拉补全*/needHot:true,/*是否需要热门城市*/type:'m-mb_airticket',dataConfig:{/*异步请求数据参数和url*/config:{'osrc':'onebox_sug','source':'ctrip_mb_airticket'},dataUrl:'http://open.onebox.so.com/dataApi/getCitySuggest?',initConfig:{/*初始化城市名称的参数*/'osrc':'onebox_sug','source':'ctrip_mb_airticket','key':"热门城市",'ishot':1}}}/*calendarsstart*/varcalendars=$('.js-mh-calendar'),calendarWrap=$('.js-start',root);/*得到前n天或后n天的日期*/functionshowDate(n,day){vardate,m,d;if(day){date=newDate(day);}else{date=newDate();}date.setDate(date.getDate()+n);date=$.calendar.formatDate(date);/*调用calendar.js中的格式化日期方法*/returndate;};/*日历*/functioninitCalendar(input,date,panelObj){varcalendar=newCalendar({maxDate:showDate(365),minDate:showDate(0),element:input,firstDay:0,swipeable:true});calendar.selectedDate(date);calendar.refresh();calendar.on('select',function(e,date,dateStr){/*点击日历项改变input框内的时间和日期*/varweek=["日","一","二","三","四","五","六"],day=date.getDay(),wrapClass=$(e.target.element).parents('.page-panel').data('pop');wrap=$('.'+wrapClass);wrap.find(".js-mh-week").html('星期'+week[day]);wrap.find(".js-mh-day").html(dateStr);panelObj.hide();});};varpanelCalendarWrap=$('.js-calendar-panel'),$cancelCalendarBtn=$('.panel-back',panelCalendarWrap),$inputCalendar=$('.js-start');varpanelRetCalendarWrap=$('.js-returnCalendar-panel'),$cancelRetCalendarBtn=$('.panel-back',panelRetCalendarWrap),$inputRetCalendar=$('.js-return');(functioninitPanelCalendar(){/*初始化第1个日历*/varpagePanelCalendar=newPagePanel({element:panelCalendarWrap,hash:'calendar'});window.panelCalendar=pagePanelCalendar;panelCalendar.hide();$cancelCalendarBtn.on('click',function(e){/*关闭弹框*/e.preventDefault();panelCalendar.hide();});$inputCalendar.on('click',function(){/*显示弹框*/panelCalendar.show();});/*初始化第2个日历*/varpagePanelRetCalendar=newPagePanel({element:panelRetCalendarWrap,hash:'returnCalendar'});window.panelRetCalendar=pagePanelRetCalendar;panelRetCalendar.hide();$cancelRetCalendarBtn.on('click',function(e){/*关闭弹框*/e.preventDefault();panelRetCalendar.hide();});$inputRetCalendar.on('click',function(){/*显示弹框*/panelRetCalendar.show();});})();/*初始化日历日期显示*/initCalendar(calendars.filter("[data-type='start']"),showDate(1),panelCalendar);initCalendar(calendars.filter("[data-type='return']"),showDate(7),panelRetCalendar);/*计算两个时间天数差*/functiondiffTime(startD,endD){varday=Math.ceil((endD-startD)/1000/3600/24);returnday;}/*calendarsend*/vartimer;varnodes={tip:$('.mh-tips-red',root),from:'.js-text-from',to:'.js-text-to',changeBtn:$('.js-mh-change',root),date:'.js-mh-day',form:$('.mh-contentform',root)};/*显示提示信息*/functionshowTip(text){nodes.tip.text(text).show();clearTimeout(timer);timer=setTimeout(function(){nodes.tip.hide(300);},2000)}vardateEle=$(nodes.date,root);/*日期显示*//*如果两个城市框中都是国内，则跳转到国内的url，否则是国际*/functioncheckFlight(){varformText=$(nodes.from,root);vartoText=$(nodes.to,root);varfromDate=dateEle.filter("[data-type='dobStart']").text();vartoDate=dateEle.filter("[data-type='dobEnd']").text();if(!formText.text()){return2;/*没有出发城市返回2*/}elseif(!toText.text()){return3;/*没有到达城市返回3*/}elseif(formText.text()==toText.text()){return1;}/*出发时间大于到达时间且到达时间显示时*/if(fromDate&&toDate&&retDateWrap.css('display')=='block'){if(newDate(fromDate).getTime()>newDate(toDate).getTime()){return4;}}/*没有data-foreign或者其属性值为0的时候是国内，返回false*/if(formText.data('foreign')==='0'&&toText.data('foreign')==='0'){return'inland';}else{return'intal';}}functionsetIntalUrl(me){varform=me.closest(".js-mh-form"),url="";varfrom=$(nodes.from,root),to=$(nodes.to,root),fromEn=from.data('nameen'),toEn=to.data('nameen'),fromCode=from.data('code'),toCode=to.data('code'),fromDate=dateEle.filter("[data-type='dobStart']").text(),intal=form.data('intal');if(isRoundTrip){/*往返*/vartoDate=dateEle.filter("[data-type='dobEnd']").text();if(fromDate&&toDate){url=form.attr("action")+"international/round-"+fromEn+"-"+toEn+"-"+fromCode+"-"+toCode+"-all?Relddate="+fromDate+"&Relrdate="+toDate+"&popup=close&"+intal;}/*往返url示例：http://m.ctrip.com/html5/flight/international/round-beijing-tokyo-BJS-TYO-all?Relddate=2015-06-19&Relrdate=2015-06-23&sourceid=4682&allianceid=5376&sid=240801*/}else{if(fromDate){url=form.attr("action")+"international/single-"+fromEn+"-"+toEn+"-"+fromCode+"-"+toCode+"-all?Relddate="+fromDate+"&popup=close&"+intal;}/*单程url示例：http://m.ctrip.com/html5/flight/international/single-beijing-tokyo-BJS-TYO-all?Relddate=2015-06-19&sourceid=4682&allianceid=5376&sid=240801*/}if(url){location.href=url+form.serialize();}}/*设置国内航班url跳转*/functionsetInlandUrl(me){varform=me.closest(".js-mh-form"),url="";/*起始城市*/varcityStartInput=$(nodes.from,root),cityArriveInput=$(nodes.to,root),startCode=cityStartInput.data('code'),endCode=cityArriveInput.data('code'),inland=form.data('inland');if(isRoundTrip){/*往返*/varcurrenTimestamp=newDate().getTime(),startTime=dateEle.filter("[data-type='dobStart']").text(),endTime=dateEle.filter("[data-type='dobEnd']").text(),startTimestamp=newDate(startTime).getTime(),endTimestamp=newDate(endTime).getTime(),startDay=diffTime(currenTimestamp,startTimestamp),endDay=diffTime(startTimestamp,endTimestamp);if(startCode&&endCode){/*url=form.attr("action")+encodeURIComponent(startCode)+"-"+encodeURIComponent(endCode)+"-d/depart-"+startDay+".html?rdays="+endDay+"&popup=close&"+inland;*/url=form.attr("action")+encodeURIComponent(startCode)+"-"+encodeURIComponent(endCode)+"-d.html?dtime="+startTime+"&rtime="+endTime+"&popup=close&"+inland;/*http://m.ctrip.com/html5/flight/BJS-CAN-d.html?dtime=2015-07-01&rtime=2015-07-07&popup=close&allianceid=5376&sid=240801&sourceid=4681*/}}else{/*单程*/varcurDateTime=newDate().getTime(),endTime=dateEle.filter("[data-type='dobStart']").text(),endDateTime=newDate(endTime).getTime(),day=diffTime(curDateTime,endDateTime);if(startCode&&endCode){url=form.attr("action")+encodeURIComponent(startCode)+"-"+encodeURIComponent(endCode)+"-day-"+day+".html?&popup=close&Ddate1="+endTime+"&"+inland;/*http://m.ctrip.com/html5/flight/BJS-SZX-day-29.html?Ddate1=2015-07-29*/}}if(url){location.href=url+form.serialize();}}/*提交表单根据单程/往返拼接不同的url*/$('.mh-btn-search',root).on("click",function(e){e.preventDefault();varme=$(this),isIntal=checkFlight();switch(isIntal){case1:showTip('是不是手误了？出发和到达城市相同哦！');break;case2:showTip('请选择出发城市！');break;case3:showTip('请选择到达城市！');break;case4:showTip('请选择正确的出发和到达时间');break;case'intal':setIntalUrl(me);break;case'inland':setInlandUrl(me)}});/*出发和到达城市互换*/functionexchangeCity(){varfrom=$(nodes.from,root),fromVal=from.val()||from.text(),fromEn=from.data('nameen'),fromCode=from.data('code'),fromForeign=from.data('foreign'),to=$(nodes.to,root),toVal=to.val()||to.text(),toEn=to.data('nameen'),toCode=to.data('code');toForeign=to.data('foreign'),from.text(toVal).val(toVal);from.data('nameen',toEn);from.data('code',toCode);from.data('foreign',toForeign);to.text(fromVal).val(fromVal);to.data('nameen',fromEn);to.data('code',fromCode);to.data('foreign',fromForeign);}nodes.changeBtn[0].onclick=exchangeCity;/*调用moheCityPicker*/$('.js-city-panel').moheCityPicker(cityConfig);/*模拟打点*/$(document).on('click','.js-city-panel',function(){PageLine.fill({"cat":"mohe-m-mb_airticket","data-md-p":"cityPicker"})})});
